divs: Sighting DetailsWhile out preditor calling in a remote ranch area, east of Stephenville, Tx,in 1965 with two buddies, we noticed 2 or 3 starlike objects moving at a very high altitude, no sound, 90 and 180 degree turns and stops. We observed them for maybe 15 minutes. We decided to leave. "Scared" Helicopters don't fly that high and fixed wing planes couldn't do those moves. What did we see in 1965? The Comanche Peak Power Plant was in the developmental stages at that time which was near by. They were clearly UFO's! This sighting also sounds like some that are being reported today! Contact me at 254-918-1508
Summary: several Star like figures moving in 90 degree and 180 degree angles. silent
trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were no other sightings in Stephenville on or around April 15th 1965
